alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 3:23PM CDT until April 18 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands continues and some roads in low lying areas become cut off by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
